pages.text: $(italic)It almost seems like a fever dream that you could strike with weapons faster than you can think. In the meantime, every blow costs you so much strength that you have to pause for a moment.$(br)Maybe you are getting old.$(br2)With a few small tweaks to your weapon, you can reduce this downtime somewhat.

pages.title: Characteristics
pages.text: Decreases attack cooldown.$(br2)Max Level: 2$(br)Applicable to melee weapons.
